examples.example: 我微笑着和车上的朋友告别，然后缓缓下车，去迎接新的旅程。

translate.english: I smiled and said goodbye to the friends on the car, then got off the car slowly to welcome the new journey.

examples.example: 我到达目的地后开心地下车，准备开始美好的一天。

translate.english: I got off the car happily after reaching the destination, preparing to start a beautiful day.

examples.example: 我到站后愉快地下车，开启了充满惊喜的一天。

translate.english: After I arrived at the station, I got off happily and started a day full of surprises.
